### RefsUpperBound {#a0ecf8b71cb27dbee12f90a581054a031}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned llvm::BitcodeReaderValueList::RefsUpperBound">
Maximum number of valid references.

Forward references exceeding the maximum must be invalid.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/bitcode/lib/bitcode/reader/valuelist-h/#l00034">34</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/bitcode/lib/bitcode/reader/valuelist-h">ValueList.h</a>.
